1:
Help, Yahweh, for the godly have disappeared;\q the faithful have vanished.


\q
2:
Everyone says empty words to his neighbor;\q everyone speaks with flattering lips and a double heart.
\q
3:
Yahweh, cut off all flattering lips,\q every tongue declaring great things.
\q
4:
These are those who have said, "With our tongues will we prevail.\q When our lips speak, who can be master over us?"


\q
5:
"Because of violence against the poor, because of the groans of the needy,\q I will arise," says Yahweh.
\q "I will provide the safety for which they long."


\q
6:
The words of Yahweh are pure words,\q like silver purified in a furnace on the earth,
\q refined seven times.
\q
7:
You are Yahweh! You keep them.\q You preserve the godly people from this wicked generation and forever.
\q
8: The wicked walk on every side\q when evil is exalted among the children of mankind.
